de.mrapp.android.sidebar

Enum DragMode

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<DragMode>
      • de.mrapp.android.sidebar.DragMode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<DragMode>

    public enum DragMode
extends java.lang.Enum<DragMode>
    Contains all possible drag modes, which can be applied on a sidebar to specify, on which regions dragging should be recognized.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Michael Rapp

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      BOTH
      If dragging should be recognized on the sidebar, as well as on the content.
      CONTENT_ONLY
      If dragging should only be recognized on the content.
      DISABLED
      If dragging should be not recognized at all.
      EDGE
      If dragging should only be recognized when started at the edge of the sidebar's parent view.
      SIDEBAR_ONLY
      If dragging should only be recognized on the sidebar.
